Package com.foreach.across.core.events

Interface AcrossLifecycleListener

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<AcrossLifecycleEvent>, EventListener
public interface AcrossLifecycleListener extends org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<AcrossLifecycleEvent>
Dispatching interface for intercepting AcrossLifecycleEvent in situations where EventListener can not be used (eg. in the parent ApplicationContext of an Across context).

This interface has a default implementation of onApplicationEvent(AcrossLifecycleEvent) that dispatches to corresponding event-specific methods.

NOTE: only known AcrossLifecycleEvent implementations will be handled, all others will be ignored by the default onApplicationEvent(AcrossLifecycleEvent) implementation.

Since:
3.0.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme
